fields.name: Amount
fields.description: The total amount of cost to track with the budget

fields.name: Category
fields.description: The category of the budget, whether the budget tracks cost or usage.

fields.name: CurrentSpend
fields.description: The current amount of cost which is being tracked for a budget.

fields.name: Filter
fields.description: May be used to filter budgets by user-specified dimensions and/or tags.

fields.name: ForecastSpend
fields.description: The forecasted cost which is being tracked for a budget.

fields.name: Notifications
fields.description: Dictionary of notifications associated with the budget. Budget can have up to five notifications.

fields.name: TimeGrain
fields.description: The time covered by a budget. Tracking of the amount will be reset based on the time grain. BillingMonth, BillingQuarter, and BillingAnnual are only supported by WD customers

fields.name: TimePeriod
fields.description: Has start and end date of the budget. The start date must be first of the month and should be less than the end date. Budget start date must be on or after June 1, 2017. Future start date should not be more than twelve months. Past start date should  be selected within the timegrain period. There are no restrictions on the end date.
